Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.model

Class BoatAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.model.BoatAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoat, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boat
public abstract class BoatAdapter extends Object implements IBoat, Serializable
Abstract base class that implements the IBoat interface and provides default behaviors and properties for different types of boats used in the Battleship-style game.

This class also implements Serializable to allow saving and restoring boat state. The shape field is marked transient as it is a JavaFX node that should not be serialized.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n
